description: sailboat in front of a bridge across narrow waterway; buildings at left, right and middle ground; raft, LLC
inscription:
Title, Inscription and Stamp

LLQ, printed in black: [Eug. Isabey lith] and [Paris publie par Morlot, Galerie Vivienne No. 26.]; LRQ, printed in black: [Lith. de Lemercier] and [London published by McLean, 26 Hay Market.]; LRQ, printed in black: [No. 2]
markings: LLQ, impressed in paper: [EDITEUR COMM DESTAM (illegible) / V. MORLOT / PARIS / 26 PASSAGE (illegible)]
provenance: [Catherine E. Burns, Oakland, CA, until 2002; sold in September for SOO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2002-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: bottom center, printed in black: [VUE DE CAEN.]
title: Vue de Caen
